participants.name: Lance Klem
participants.title: Managing Director at The ProSource Group

messages.message:
Owner

Hi Brian, 

I am the owner of the Prosource Group. My recruiter Veronica emailed with you regarding a senior AWS leader role. I would like to share every possible detail that we have. We are an exclusive vendor for our client and I am more than glad to give you all the information you need to see if you are interested.

Let me know if you have time on Tuesday.
Thanks,
Lance

Lance Klem
949-278-0337 | lklem@theprosourcegroup.com
What do you want to solve that you think AWS can help with?
The way the Sr Director explained it to me was "due to the Petabytes of information we have to store and keep secure, AWS is the solution that makes the most sense for our growing organization."

I'd like to set up a phone call. If I can't help then the owner of quiltdata definitely can. He's very familiar with AWS as well if you are open to contract work. What format is the data in? Does your director have an idea of what encryption scheme he would use?
Thanks Brian. Can you get on the phone with me tomorrow morning for a brief call at 8:30am?

Brian,
Good morning. I am headed into the doctor and will not be able to make our call. Do you have time Thursday morning? Whatever works best for you.
Thanks for understanding.
Lance
Thursday works, I hope you feel better soon!

BRian,
This is the job description for our call.

Tasks and Responsibilities: 
The Software Engineer that fills this role will be responsible for the development, testing, debugging and support of software related to our client’s core platform technology which processes and queries data in extremely large-scale database (petabytes). The candidate must be conscientious, detail oriented and be dedicated to seeing tasks through to completion. Above all, the candidate must have a passion for learning and technology.

Required Skills and Experience: 
•	Candidates must have 4+ years of professional software development experience
•	B.S. in Computer Science or a related field
•	Candidates must have a very high proficiency with at least one strongly typed language (such as Scala, Java or C#) and a dynamic scripting language like Python
•	Proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, AngularJS, Bootstrap and the building of RESTful API
•	Relational databases (in particular, PostgreSQL)
•	Algorithm design/development, and data structure
•	Experience with a version control system such as GIT or experience with TFS
•	Hands-on experience in software QA and unit testing
•	Candidates must possess excellent communication skills across technical and non-technical domains
•	Candidates must be self-motivated and possess a “can do” attitude

Preferred Qualifications: 
•	Experience with Linux OS
•	Experience in DevOps processes and CI/CD management tools
•	Experience with AWS cloud infrastructure
•	Experience with scrum software development framework
•	Familiar with software containerization using Docker and programming of distributed systems

http://www.humanlongevity.com/
Here is our clients website
Want to call back, my phone didn't even store the number. Most annoying UX bug ever. Holding a button accidentally shuts down the phone.
I can't access that URL, it comes up blank.
nvm, it doesn't come up with adblocker turned on
